title: Create New Password
subtitle: Enter a strong password with at least 8 characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and a symbol.

Errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {min} characters
Errors.passwordComplexity: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one symbol
Errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
Errors.invalidOtp: Please enter a valid OTP code.
